intent_atoms.description: The fixture catalog must always contain entries that expose the correct box layout, payload sizing, and documented warnings/errors.
All binary assets in the fixture corpus can be deterministically regenerated using generate_fixtures.py.
Regression tests (FixtureCatalogExpandedCoverageTests) must pass for all catalog entries.
A deterministic generation script is used to rebuild all binary assets.

functional_units.name: Fixture Corpus Expansion
functional_units.description: Adds new MP4/DASH segment fixtures including fragmented files, large mdat boxes, and malformed samples to the test suite.

functional_units.name: Deterministic Fixture Generation Script
functional_units.description: Provides a script to rebuild all binary fixture assets deterministically for reproducibility.

functional_units.name: Extended Fixture Catalog Metadata
functional_units.description: Enhances catalog entries with detailed metadata, documentation, and expected validation outcomes for each fixture.

functional_units.name: Regression Tests for Fixture Catalog
functional_units.description: Runs tests that verify catalog entries expose correct box layout, payload sizing, and documented warnings/errors.
